actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
name: Richard F. Griffin, Jr.
nominee: Richard F. Griffin, Jr., of the District of Columbia, to be a Member of the National Labor Relations Board for the term of five years expiring August 27, 2016
position: Member of the National Labor Relations Board
referred to: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
